description:
Tampon Tim would be so proud.

Given that it’s extremely likely not one single man used a tampon at Meta headquarters, the company has decided not to continue with this insanity. However, in Progressive La La Land, biological reality takes a backseat, and you end up with this story.

Several male Meta employees protested this perfectly sane decision by bringing in tampons they will never use.

Never forget these are the people who called JD Vance "weird" pic.twitter.com/SWlOivVfkC
— Riley Gaines (@Riley_Gaines_) January 31, 2025
title: Meta employees DEMAND tampons be returned to the men's bathrooms

description:
You would think that after the first two assassination attempts on Trump’s life, the last thing the Dems would do would be to call leftists to “fight in the streets,” but that is not the case for House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries.

"We're gonna fight it legislatively, we're gonna fight it in the courts, and we're gonna fight it in the streets," Hakeem Jeffries said in response to how to stand against the Trump agenda. pic.twitter.com/3PeUZpUmjU
— The Post Millennial (@TPostMillennial) January 31, 2025

This is why the White
title: Hakeem Jeffries makes violent threat against MAGA, promises to take his fight against Trump "to the streets"
